A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Are you kidding me?! I avoided all previews\, all posts\, or any written material about this movie altogether so I can have an unbiased approach to watching this film (yeah\, that’s the type of Star Wars fan that I am). This movie literally had no story\, no plot\, farts on any questions you had about Episode 7\, and basically is a dried up turd that doesn’t deserve the Star Wars name. The characters actually make fun of how dumb this movie is in the actual movie. This is a GIANT letdown. I love Star Wars and actually wrote a review for the first time...ever. Let that sink in. Now the only thing left worth waiting for is when South Park makes an episode about all of this showing Luke getting raped by this horrible director. That’s right ladies and gentlemen...this is an Indiana Jones Crystal Skull alert...that bad.
